description:
Trey makes an unexpected visit to Yuma’s house and discovers the secret behind Yuma’s incredible dueling skills - over lunch!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: For the Sake of Family... The Gentle Avenger: III!!
Kazoku no Tame ni... Yasashiki Fukushuusha Three!!
家族のために...優しき復讐者·III[スリー]!!
